casebody.data:
Wolfgang E. LOHRMANN, M.D.
v.
IREDELL MEMORIAL HOSPITAL INCORPORATED d/b/a Iredell Memorial Hospital's Healthcare System. No. 655P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. Samuel O. Southern, Raleigh, Harriett Twiggs Smalls, Greensboro, Douglas G. Eisele, Statesville, for Lohrmann. Anthony H. Brett, Winston-Salem, Donald R. Esposito, Jr., Charlotte, for Iredell Memorial Hospital.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd day of November 2005 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd day of March 2006."
